name: is-odd-rs-workspace
description: A Rust library to check if a number is odd

scripts.test: cargo test && cd libs/node && wasm-pack test --node && cd ../../ && cd libs/python && cargo test --no-default-features && cd ../.. && pnpm -r test && pytest
scripts.build: cd libs/node && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ./pkg --out-name index && node script.js && cd ../../ && cd libs/python && maturin build --release --out dist
